The FBI raided his hotel room and office last week as part of a broad criminal investigation into his personal business dealings, which is in part focused on Cohen's $130,000 payment to adult film star Stormy Daniels.
The X-rated actress has claimed she received the funds in exchange for her silence about an alleged affair with Trump more than a decade ago.
Cohen's move to dismiss Wednesday comes amid his fight to recover documents and electronic files seized by federal agents.
